solution_line_template: Phil starts with {initial_books} books and loses {lost_books}, for {initial_books}-{lost_books}=<<{initial_books}-{lost_books}={remaining_books}>>{remaining_books} books

Each of Phil's remaining books has {pages_per_book} pages, so he has {remaining_books}*{pages_per_book}= <<{remaining_books}*{pages_per_book}={total_remaining_pages}>>{total_remaining_pages} pages worth of books
